Description: Low conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style patterned, pottery chalice; white slip; exterior streakily glazed (fired red and worn); inscription on underside.
Curator's comments: The registration number '773' is written in pencil on the underside of the foot.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 9)
Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 170, no. 45)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1089) (phase 2)
